author: BarackObama
content: "It is surely the pursuit of peace that is most needed in this world so full of strife." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "As members of Congress reflect on their pending decision, I urge them to set aside political considerations.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "As Americans, we should be proud of this achievement." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "Now we have before us a solution that prevents Iran from obtaining a nuclear weapon without resorting to war." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "President Kennedy warned Americans not to see conflict as inevitable. It is time to apply such wisdom.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "I have repeatedly challenged anyone opposed to this deal to put forward a better, plausible alternative." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "When we carefully examine the arguments against this deal, none of them stand up to scrutiny.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "If Iran violates this deal, we will have ample opportunity to respond." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "Worry less about being labeled weak. Worry more about getting it right.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "How can we in good conscience justify war before we have tested a diplomatic agreement that achieves our objectives?" ‚ÄîPresident Obama

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúThe choice we face is ultimately between diplomacy or some sort of war.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúWalk away from this agreement and you will get a better deal‚Äîfor Iran.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúThose who say we can walk away from this deal and maintain sanctions are selling a fantasy.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "We will continue to have sanctions in place on Iran's support for terrorism and violation of human rights."‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúThere is no scenario where sanctions relief turns Iran into the region's dominate power.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúAn argument against sanctions relief is effectively an argument against any diplomatic solution.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "Without this deal, the scenarios that critics warn about happening in 15 years could happen six months from now." ‚ÄîPresident Obama

author: BarackObama
content: "The bottom line is, if Iran cheats, we can catch them‚Äîand we will." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúThis deal is not just the best choice among alternatives‚Äîthis is the strongest non-proliferation agreement ever.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúIf Iran violates the agreement over the next decade all of the sanctions can snap back in to place.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "Iran has powerful incentives to keep its commitments." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "This deal shuts off the type of covert program Iran has pursued in the past.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "In July, we reached a comprehensive plan of action that meets our objectives." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "What was once proclaimed as a historic mistake is now held up as a success." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúThe progress of Iran's nuclear program was halted for the first time in a decade.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "It was diplomacy that ratcheted up the pressure on Iran." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "Winning this global buy-in was not easy. I know. I was there." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "What made our new approach more effective was our ability to draw upon new U.N. Security Council resolutions." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúIt was our very willingness to negotiate that helped America rally the world to our cause.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "I have also made clear my preference for a peaceful diplomatic resolution of the issue." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "Even before taking office, I made clear that Iran would not be allowed to acquire a nuclear weapon on my watch." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "The question then is not whether to prevent Iran from obtaining a nuclear weapon, but how." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: "Now more than ever, we need clear thinking in our foreign policy." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

author: BarackObama
content: ‚ÄúMore than a decade later, we still live with the consequences of the decision to invade Iraq.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
